trans-unit.source: Represents a content anchor or cargo resource for an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tartalom horgonyzási vagy rakomány erőforrását jelöli egy <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: AnnotationResource elements are used to model <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> (the data that is being annotated) and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> (the data provided by the user such as a text note) in an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationResource elemek használt modellre <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>(a van feliratozva alatt álló adatokat) és <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>(az adatok, például egy szöveges Megjegyzés: a felhasználó által megadott) a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Through the use of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.ContentLocators%2A> an AnnotationResource can refer to the content, directly contain the content, or both.
trans-unit.target: Használatával <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.ContentLocators%2A>egy AnnotationResource is tekintse meg a tartalmat, ha közvetlenül tartalmazza a tartalmat, vagy mindkettőt.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.ContentLocators%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor támogatja a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastruktúra és nem javasolt közvetlenül a kódból használni.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is intended for annotation serializer use only.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor csak a jegyzet szerializáló használatra szánt.

trans-unit.source: For application needs, use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts a specified `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazás igényeinek megfelelően, használjon a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A>konstruktort, amely fogad egy meghatározott `name` paraméter.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor támogatja a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastruktúra és nem javasolt közvetlenül a kódból használni.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is intended for annotation serializer use only.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor csak a jegyzet szerializáló használatra szánt.

trans-unit.source: For application needs, use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts a specified `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazás igényeinek megfelelően, használjon a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A>konstruktort, amely fogad egy meghatározott `name` paraméter.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that identifies this resource.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] , amely azonosítja az erőforrás.

trans-unit.source: id is equal to Guid.Empty.
trans-unit.target: idmegegyezik a következőre: Guid.Empty.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> class with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref> egy adott nevű osztályt.

trans-unit.source: The `name` parameter is provided for convenience only and no validation is performed on the string.
trans-unit.target: A `name` paraméter van megadva, csupán kényelmi célokat szolgál, és nem lehet érvényesíteni a karakterlánc hajtja végre.

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationResource constructor automatically creates a unique [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A AnnotationResource konstruktor automatikusan létrehoz egy egyedi [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] keresztül érhető el ez a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Id%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: A name to identify this resource from other <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*> defined in the same annotation.
trans-unit.target: Ehhez az erőforráshoz, a többi azonosító nevet <> </> *> és <> </> *> ugyanazon jegyzet definiálva.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref> elements contained in this resource.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyűjteménye <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"> </xref> elemeiben ehhez az erőforráshoz.

trans-unit.source: The ContentLocators property will never return `null`, however the collection may be empty if the resource contains no content locators.
trans-unit.target: A ContentLocators tulajdonság soha nem fog visszaadni `null`, bár lehet, hogy a gyűjtemény üres, ha az erőforrás nem tartalom keresők tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: The collection of content locators contained in this resource.
trans-unit.target: Ez az erőforrás található tartalom keresők gyűjteménye.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects that define the content of this resource.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyűjteménye a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objektumok, amelyek ehhez az erőforráshoz a tartalom meg.

trans-unit.source: Contents never returns `null`; however the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> collection may be empty if the resource contains no content.
trans-unit.target: Soha ne tartalmát adja vissza `null`; azonban a <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>lehet, hogy a gyűjtemény üres, ha az erőforrás nincs tartalma.</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The collection of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects that define the content of this resource.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjteménye a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objektumok, amelyek ehhez az erőforráshoz a tartalom meg.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mindig vissza <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: Lásd: [jegyzetek séma](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) séma részleteiről.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.
trans-unit.target: Lásd: [jegyzetek séma](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) séma részleteiről.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of this resource.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] erőforrás.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that identifies this resource.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] , amely azonosítja az erőforrás.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a name for this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja azt a nevet a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name assigned to this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> to distinguish it from other <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*> in the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A megadott név <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref> hogy megkülönböztesse a többi <> </> *> vagy <> </> *> a a jegyzet.

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> from a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Deserializes a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref> a megadott <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The XML reader to deserialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-olvasó deszerializálni a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref> a.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A szerializált XML-kódja a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref> érvénytelen.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> to a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Rendezi sorba az <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref> megadott <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The XML writer to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-író szerializálni a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*>érvénytelen.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*>
